title: Ekko's Sister?

embed.description: RIOT HAS ACCIDENTALLY REVEALED THE NEW AD CARRY ON THE PBE! IN OTHER NEWS, 6 NEW SKINS HAVE JUST BEEN RELEASED ONTO THE PBE! LEAGUEOFDRAMA CHANNEL: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPUqpEeM18VfCgp5hklPBIw PROF AKALI GAMEPLAY CHANNEL: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7wm0HW1U30DZT06gBJ5bDA Follow my social medias!: Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ProfAkali/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheBestAkaliEvr Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/professorakali Twitch: https://go.twitch.tv/coachakali Guys, come join our community discord!

body:
So the new adc has been linked out and Professor Akali said that it could be Ekko's Sister but i read the Lore and his little story and their is 2 Ekko's Multiverse Theory.
In the story his parents what him to be the "hope" to fix everything but cause Ekko doesn't see his parents that much due to they work he is rewinding back in time to 18 second's when his parents come home all the time to relive that moment (sad but i get it) so he is stuck in those 18 second's forever 
BUT
In the LORE he is the "Hope" that everyone see's and he defeats Viktor 

So i'm very confused cause his mother ISN'T pregnant in BOTH of the STORY or LORE so i want to know what you guys think? Who could be the new champion? and does it connect with Ekko or not?
